summary: The Axe of the Headless Horseman at your doorstep.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][center][/center][center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-0-1498827450.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-1-1498827450.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img][/center][center]I always was fascinated by the Headless Horseman whether it was in movies, TV shows or books.
Despite his innability to talk, he got to be known as being a legendary supernatural force.
He never had to speak in order to spread fear, he never had to explain itself for what he did.
The headless horseman doesn't give a f**k. He goes and chop heads and no one can stop him.

I searched on the entire nexus for an axe ressembling this.
So i decided to learn 3d modeling and importing custom weapons made from scratch into skyrim and this is the result.
It's not perfect but i made my best to make it as close to perfect as possible with my limited 3d modeling and texturing abilities (and scripting).

Those kind of axes, the historically accurate ones, are very rare in skyrim modding. All the weapons we see, although very well done, are more fantasy than realistic. It's not a critic but more diversity in style are always welcome in my opinion.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-0-1498827879.png[/img]
The headless Horseman has come to Skyrim (or so his weapon) and it is up to you to unleash hell as you see fit.
This adds the axe of the Headless Horseman from the TV Show Sleepy Hollow.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827985.png[/img]
There is the normal version and the heated version (see screenshots) both have one handed and two handed versions.
The heated versions glows during combat only with some custom sounds during each activation and deactivation
with a burning slashing sound when hitting your targets.
They all share the same stats of the daedric war axes and battle axes.

There never was a name for the horseman's axe in all of its tales so i had to give it a unique name.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-0-1498827985.png[/img]
Extract content into Data folder. It's necessary to say it you never know when a new guy pops in.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-1-1498827985.png[/img]
In a stone coffin near the Ritual Stone not far from Whiterun (if you still cannot find it, i uploaded a picture).

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img][/center][center]PS:
Don't bother asking about the outfit it does not come with this mod and cannot release it.
It is a modification i made for me personally it and belongs to another mod.

Gauntlets are from the gorgeous Knight Armor and Sword by [b]Hovihar
[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82413/?

[u]WARNING: I highly suggest using a mod that puts one handed weapons on the back or you'll get a little surprise when in first person. Just sayin'

GLITCHES:
[/u]If only the sounds work and the glow doesn't show up, try charging the weapon with a soulgem (during combat).
You only need to do this two or three times in your entire savegame time so you won't have to do this often.

The reason for this glitch is tied to the game itself and not the mod. My mod uses the "Enhance Weapon" Effect archetype and this very thing is a little glitched in the game. There are other mods that uses this archetype as well and have the same glitch too.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-0-1498828111.jpg[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img]

author: Joebenz
